name: dbhub
description: Universal database MCP server connecting to MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQLite, DuckDB and etc.

tools.name: list_connectors
tools.description: Lists all available database connectors and their sample DSNs. Indicates which connector is active based on the current DSN.

tools.name: run_query
tools.description: Executes a SQL query and returns the results.

DATABASE_URL.description: The database connection string which includes the user, password, host, port, and database name.
DATABASE_URL.title: DATABASE_URL
